subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Ghana claimed third place at the African Cup of Nations in Kumasi, Ghana, rallying past Ivory Coast, 4-2, with two late goals Saturday. Cameroon will play Egypt in the African Cup final Sunday. Cameroon failed to qualify for the 2006 World Cup when it was held to a 1-1 tie at home by Egypt in its final qualifier.
